snippet: Tunisia stormed to a lead on three occasions before the Americans pulled away in the second quarter in pool play.
lead_paragraph: Tunisia stormed to a lead on three occasions before the Americans pulled away in the second quarter in pool play.

headline.seo: U.S. Men’s Olympic Basketball Team Recovers from Slow Start to Rout Tunisia
headline.main: Slow Start, but U.S. Men’s Basketball Team More Than Makes Up for It in a Rout
headline.print_headline: Slow Start, but U.S. Men More Than Make Up for It in a Rout
